# preferredOutputNumberOfChannels

**Instance Property**

The preferred number of output channels for the current route.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredOutputNumberOfChannels: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the preferred number of output channels selected using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setPreferredOutputNumberOfChannels(_:)] method.

To determine the actual number of channels, query the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/outputNumberOfChannels] property.

## Setting the number of output channels

- **setPreferredOutputNumberOfChannels(_:)**: Sets the preferred number of output channels for the current route.
- **outputNumberOfChannels**: The number of audio output channels.
- **maximumOutputNumberOfChannels**: The maximum number of output channels available for the current audio route.
